title: Napoleon: Total War
notes: "Error creating process <msiexec /i vcredist.msi>. Reason: File not found" when attempting to install Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redist. Game launches as black screen and hangs

title: Napoleon: Total War
notes: Map view works and I played lots of rounds, but it crashes each time I want to fight a battle on my own. Crash when jumping into battle.

title: Napoleon: Total War
notes: Runs fine but entering tactical battle causes crash because of "set pixel format" issue. Game needs its own Wine/Proton build

title: Napoleon: Total War
notes: Crashes upon starting a battle. Tested on the Italian campaign. First fight. Medium-high settings.
Everything appears to function normally, however the performance is sub 30fps regardless of graphics settings.
title: Napoleon: Total War™

notes: Crashes every time when trying to start a manual battle.
title: Napoleon: Total War™

notes:
Tried all the tweaks, different version of Proton, disabling dxvk to no avail. It crashes when entering the battle, while map turn-based strategy works fine. Since this game is all about realistic battles, it is unplayable. 
However, this game works perfectly well when steam is ran with an older version of wine: staging-2.21 (one can arrange it using ie Lutris).
title: Napoleon: Total War™
